entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
